SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientcontroller.connection

Class ConnectionRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientcontroller.connection.ConnectionRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection, InterfaceClient, Serializable, Remote
public class ConnectionRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements InterfaceClient, Serializable, Connection
The ConnectionRMI class manages the connection of RMI clients to the server.
See Also:

      public void sendParameters(int maxPlayerNumber, boolean onlyOneCommon)
      Sends the game parameters to the server controller.
      Parameters:
      maxPlayerNumber - the maximum number of players in the game
      onlyOneCommon - boolean flag rappresenting the number of commoncards: true if there is only one common goal card, false if there are two
